oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Belmont Mansion on the Eve of the Battle of Nashville
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Belmont Mansion and grounds and water tower, drawn by Union soldier during encampment prior to Battle of Nashville. "Ackland" (sic) at top left.
Drawing by Union soldier of Belmont Mansion and grounds on 5 December 1864.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Architecture, Domestic
Taking Care of Business
